article.title: Our Partners - World Trade Centers
article.summary: Learn about World Trade Centers in the Strategic Partnership Program.

source_agencies.source_agency: International Trade AdministrationGlobal MarketsU.S. Commerical Service

article.content:
Strategic Partners

The use of logos does not connote endorsement by the Department of Commerce of the organizations' views, products, or services.

World Trade Centers


The World Trade Center Delaware is a private-sector, non-profit organization helping companies succeed in the international marketplace. With a primary focus on export promotion, WTC Delaware develops programs to assist businesses and organizations including educational and networking events, market research, and consulting. Thispartnership willhelp WTC Delaware generate new opportunities for moreDelaware exportersin a wide range of manufacturing and services industries to help secure America's future in this increasingly competitive world.
